ru.mockertim.cbr

Class CBRFCurrencyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.mockertim.cbr.CBRFCurrencyClient

  • public class CBRFCurrencyClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple non-gui client of the currency rates web-service of the Central Bank of the Russian Federation. Created at 13:33 08.10.14
    Author:
    Timur Shakuov (t.shakuov at gmail.com)
